original_text: He used the grapes to make wine. One day, he drank some of the wine and he became drunk. He lay inside his tent and he slept. He was not wearing any clothes.
korean_text: 포도주를 마시고 취하여 그 장막 안에서 벌거벗은지라

sentences.original_text: He used the grapes to make wine.
One day, he drank some of the wine
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 그는 포도주를 약간 마셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He was not wearing any clothes.
